ideas.title: FIX: Invert confidence (raw conf negatively correlated with wins)
ideas.description: Data analysis confirmed: raw_conf ↔ win_rate = -0.083 (NEGATIVE). High confidence = MORE LIKELY TO LOSE. Invert confidence before calibration.
ideas.hypothesis: Inverting confidence will fix the fundamental correlation issue

ideas.title: ARCH: EV Gate (expected value after costs)
ideas.description: Gate on positive EV accounting for spread, slippage, theta decay. Eliminates high-confidence negative EV trades.
ideas.hypothesis: High confidence doesn't mean positive EV when costs dominate

ideas.title: ARCH: Per-regime calibration
ideas.description: Separate calibrators per HMM regime + time-of-day. 70% confidence in low-vol open != 70% in high-vol close.
ideas.hypothesis: Regime-specific calibration improves ECE and confidence usefulness

ideas.title: ARCH: Auto-disable underperforming regimes
ideas.description: Track performance per regime, auto-disable trading in regimes with negative expectancy.
ideas.hypothesis: Some regimes consistently lose - stop trading them

ideas.title: ARCH: Combined - EV Gate + Regime Attribution
ideas.description: Use EV gate AND per-regime tracking with auto-disable together.
ideas.hypothesis: Multiple filters working together = highest quality trades

ideas.title: ARCH: Greeks-aware stops (vol-adjusted)
ideas.description: Express stops in ATR/sigma units, not fixed %. Account for delta/gamma. Reduces wiggle stop-outs.
ideas.hypothesis: Vol-adjusted stops reduce premature exits in high-gamma regimes

ideas.title: ARCH: Freeze NN weights (stable calibration)
ideas.description: Freeze predictor weights during session, only update calibrators + thresholds online.
ideas.hypothesis: Frequent retraining destabilizes calibration - freeze for stability

ideas.title: DATA: Inverted confidence (40-50% sweet spot)
ideas.description: Analysis shows 40-50% calibrated confidence has 41.2% WR vs 31-33% for 60%+. Trade when model is UNCERTAIN, not confident.
ideas.hypothesis: Model overconfidence predicts LOSING trades. Lower confidence = better.

ideas.title: DATA: High consensus strength filter (>=0.28)
ideas.description: Signal reasoning analysis shows consensus strength >=0.28 has 50-67% WR vs 27% for lower strength.
ideas.hypothesis: Multi-timeframe agreement strength is a strong win predictor

ideas.title: DATA: Strict 30-minute max hold (not 31+)
ideas.description: 30-min exit has 41.3% WR, 31-min drops to 32%, 32-min to 12.5%. Force exact 30-min exit.
ideas.hypothesis: Extra minutes after 30 hurt performance significantly

ideas.title: DATA: Combined - Inverted conf + High consensus
ideas.description: Combine both winning signals: 40-50% confidence AND consensus strength >= 0.28
ideas.hypothesis: Uncertain model + strong consensus = highest quality trades

ideas.title: DATA: Disable confidence gate entirely
ideas.description: Since higher confidence = worse WR, try disabling confidence filtering completely
ideas.hypothesis: Confidence filter is counterproductive - removing it may help

ideas.title: BEST: V3 Multi-Horizon + Calibration Gate
ideas.description: Build on exp35_v3_multi (+3118% P&L) by adding calibration gate for higher win rate.
ideas.hypothesis: V3 architecture + calibrated confidence = best of both worlds

ideas.title: V3 Multi-Horizon 20K training
ideas.description: Extend V3 training to 20K cycles for better learning.
ideas.hypothesis: Longer training on V3 will improve per-trade P&L further

ideas.title: V3 + Strict HMM (0.75/0.25)
ideas.description: V3 Multi-Horizon with stricter HMM regime filtering.
ideas.hypothesis: V3 predictions + strong HMM trend = higher quality entries

ideas.title: V3 + Pretrained weights
ideas.description: V3 architecture starting from pretrained/trained_model.pth weights.
ideas.hypothesis: Pretrained weights + V3 architecture = faster convergence

ideas.title: PRIORITY: 50K pretrain for conservative NN
ideas.description: Train for 50K cycles to get very conservative neural network outputs like dec_validation_v2. The key is extreme selectivity.
ideas.hypothesis: Long training = conservative predictions = 2% trade rate = 60%+ win rate

ideas.title: PRIORITY: 70% calibrated confidence gate
ideas.description: Only trade when calibrated P(profit) >= 70%. Target 2-5% trade rate.
ideas.hypothesis: Extreme selectivity via calibration = 60%+ win rate

ideas.title: PRIORITY: Load dec_validation_v2 RL weights
ideas.description: Load the saved unified_rl.pth from dec_validation_v2 and test with calibration gate.
ideas.hypothesis: RL weights + calibration = replicate 60% behavior

ideas.title: Ultra-strict: HMM 0.85 + Calibration 65%
ideas.description: Require very strong HMM trend (>0.85 or <0.15) AND calibrated confidence >65%.
ideas.hypothesis: Double extreme filtering = highest quality trades only

ideas.title: 30K training on Sept-Dec data
ideas.description: Longer training period on 4 months of data for better pattern learning.
ideas.hypothesis: More training data + longer training = better generalization

ideas.title: Minimum edge threshold 0.5%
ideas.description: Only trade when predicted return > 0.5% (higher bar for entry).
ideas.hypothesis: Higher edge requirement = fewer but better trades

ideas.title: V3 + Transformer + Calibration gate
ideas.description: Combine best architecture (V3) with transformer encoder and calibration
ideas.hypothesis: Best architecture + best filtering = best results

ideas.title: HMM pure mode with strict thresholds
ideas.description: Only use HMM signals, ignore neural network entirely
ideas.hypothesis: HMM was profitable in bandit mode - test pure HMM
